climbs.name: You're All Eyeball
climbs.fa: Kelsey Gray, Sterling Anderson, Dan Linnell

content.description: Climb the blunt arete on easy terrain to a slabby section. Continue up and left to the anchor.
content.protection: 4 bolts. 2 bolt anchor (share with other routes).
content.location: Climb starts on a blunt arete.

climbs.name: Fill Up at the Flabbergastation
climbs.fa: Dan Linnell, Sterling Anderson, Kelsey Gray

content.description: Climb the face towards a roof. Pass the roof and continue to the anchor.Â
content.protection: 5 bolts. 2 bolt anchor (shared with other routes).

climbs.name: Check Out of the Slopetel
climbs.fa: Kelsey Gray, Sterling Anderson, Dan Linnell

content.description: Climb the face to a steep crux. Pass the crux and continue on to the top.
content.protection: 5 bolts. 2 bolt anchor (shared with other routes).
content.location: Just right of Fill Up at the Flabbergastation (5.9).

content.description: This is a small crag with some fun, moderate sport routes and a short approach. There are 4 bolted routes here, ranging from 5.7 to 5.10. All routes share the same anchor.
